content: Whenever college costs are discussed these days, someone who attended twenty years ago and paid their way through starts preaching about working.  With today's tuition levels, no part-time job will suffice to make a dent.  It is helpful to work always, to cover some living expenses and develop the knowledge and experience of the working world and work ethic, but make no mistake, no one can work their way through 4 years to fully pay Rutgers $30K a year for an undergrad degree.college - it's either the bank of Mom and Dad, student loans or both.
